actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the Select Committee on POW/MIA Affairs to submit its final report to the Senate prior to January 13, 1993

summary.text: Authorizes expenditures by the Select Committee on POW/MIA Affairs of the Senate for expenses incurred between January 3, 1993, and January 13, 1993, in connection with the preparation and submission before January 13, 1993, of its final report to the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the Select Committee on POW/MIA Affairs to submit its final report to the Senate prior to January 13, 1993
